name: Swearing At Motorists "Supporters Scarf"
description:
Just in time for the cold weather holiday season, 
the Swearing At Motorists "Supporters Scarf" 
pays tribute to both the geographic inspirations for S@M's music and the traditional Association Football fan's most universal symbol.

the A side 
YOU'LL NEVER ROCK ALONE
SWEARING AT MOTORISTS
THE WORLD'S LOCAL BAND SINCE 1995

the B side
SWEARING AT MOTORISTS IST BRAUN WEISS
"How's your Mom?"
NORTH MAIN-FISHTOWN-FRIEDRICHSHAIN-SANKT PAULI

$30 
(includes standard shipping from Germany to USA/Canada/UK/Europe)
